name: Omegamon_Zwart
description: Omnimon Zwart is a bipedal knight Digimon with red eyes and equipped with black armor. Its helmet has a gold spike in the front and two black spikes in the back. It has a red jewel on its chest, surrounded by gold stripes. It bears the Crest of Courage on the Brave Shield Omega on its left shoulder, while its left hand ends with a BlackWarGreymon head, from which the Grey Sword emerges. The DigiCode on its Grey Sword reads "TERMINATION" ( TERMINATION ). Its right shoulder has gold spikes, while its right hand is a BlackMetalGarurumon head, from which the Garuru Cannon emerges. It also wears a black cape, the inside of which is red.
